channel.title: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals
channel.description:
I have created a wiki to document the internals of the new client. http://rsclient.nickstallman.net/
The sooner we know how it ticks the sooner we can get back to cheating. :)

item.title: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

It doesn’t really matter anymore, this is several build/releases old.

Read full topic
item.source: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals

item.title: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:2, topic:3017”]Just a friendly warning - if you run that deob you will almost certainly be banned due to a probable trap I just found. Take a look at it, decipher some code, get ideas…but DON’T RUN IT if it’s able to connect to the server at all.

(PS-you can put the link back up but please include a warning for now)[/quote]

Thanks Krich, Most people wouldnt have known :p, Silly Noobs

Anyway, in this client i would suggest you LEARN how it works and then maybe write an extension bot for the runescape.jar

Read full topic
item.source: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals

item.description:
@nejat wrote:

so we can start making bots now?? if yes, then what the hell are ya waiting for guys. i would love to help ya but ehhh mah back hurts ;D :useotherwinkgrinfornow:

Read full topic

item.description:
@masonw wrote:

Pwnd:

Masonw, it’s just a way to get us thinking again. We’re well on our way though.

Yes I know I was just saying it has changed more than I would have expected.

item.title: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals
item.dc:creator: @masonw masonw
item.description:
@masonw wrote:

This is weird… I looked at class 1 and it looks like that is just for displaying the message when you get IP banned. There is no client.java, this changed more than I would have expected.

EDIT: Nevermind I found the client.java, it’s not my fault, it’s early in the morning lol

Read full topic

item.title: Wiki for documenting the new client's internals
item.dc:creator: @Cheater Cheater
item.description:
@Cheater wrote:

Krichevskoy:

Just a friendly warning - if you run that deob you will almost certainly be banned due to a probable trap I just found. Take a look at it, decipher some code, get ideas…but DON’T RUN IT if it’s able to connect to the server at all.

I thought that was plainly obvious.

You’d have to do a bit of editing anyway to get it to run.

Read full topic
